MP4Descriptor * GetDescriptor (UInt32T descIndex)
 Get descriptor indexed by descIndex.

Detailed Description

Imif atom descriptor property.

Need this class, derived from descriptor property, to enable fetching descriptors directly, which original descriptor property does not provide.
